SELECT mn_use_dvs_det , sum(mn_amount) as sum_amount FROM tb_mn WHERE mn_use_dvs = #{mn_use_dvs} AND mn_upd_id = #{loginId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(mn_upd_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(mn_upd_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY mn_use_dvs_det ORDER BY sum(mn_amount) desc
